title: Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in red color pencil at upper right margin right: DIN-A4; inscribed in graphite at lower left: K. 9/30/33; lower right in graphite: SCALE 1"=1'0", 7510 [circled]; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; dimensions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for low sideboard. Rectangular body with two drawers at left and right near top, two larger cabinets below; straight and squared, tapered legs.Top in dark, reflective surface, (Bakelite?); body in lighter material, legs in darker material.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sideboard", September 30, 1933.
September 30, 1933. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-918.
